text:
Salonized | Software Engineer | onsite | full-time | Amsterdam, Netherlands

We help making running a salon easy. Sounds boring? Heck no! We have the happiest customers, fantastisc design challenges, high quality demands, a development first company and amazing colleagues.

We are looking for self managing full stack and frontend developers of all levels to support our fast growing company.

Our stack is Rails, Ember.js, lots of internal tools, kubernetes, and ever growing.

We offer a competetive salary, benefits, frequent beers and wines, room to grow and a weekly hackday.

More info and application here: https://www.salonized.com/en/jobs/full-stack-developer https://www.salonized.com/en/jobs/frontend-developer

Or email me timon @ salonized dot com
